content.question: If the value of the price elasticity of supply is 3, which of the following is true?

choices.label: A percentage increase in price will lead to a relatively smaller percentage increase in quantity supplied.
The supply curve is downward sloping with respect to the price of output.
A 10 percent decrease in price will decrease the quantity supplied by 30 percent.
A 3 percent increase in price will decrease the quantity supplied by 10 percent.

content.answer: A 10 percent decrease in price will decrease the quantity supplied by 30 percent.
